rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
No high-potency verbs, metaphors, superlatives, or critical alert phrases.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports cases confirmed/suspected pending results, bare facts.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Reports cases pending lab results ('pending lab results'), part of testing/response, without linking to calm/safety.
